summary: Four boys from Sudan embark on a journey to America after years of wandering Sub-Saharan Africa in search of safety.
cast: Panther Bior|John Bul Dau|Nicole Kidman|Daniel Abol Pach
director: Directors: Christopher Dillon Quinn (as Christopher Quinn), Tommy Walker (co-director)
title: God Grew Tired of Us: The Story of Lost Boys of Sudan
